Algal bloom is back in Hawke’s Bay, no swimming or shellfish collecting on Cape Coast advised https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/algal-bloom-is-back-in-hawkes-bay-no-swimming-or-shellfish-collecting-on-cape-coast-建议/BFJG356FFRF6FALMRLEZZ3QEEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/algal-bloom-is-back-in-hawkes-bay-no-swimming-or-shellfish-collecting-on-cape-coast-建议/BFJG356FFRF6FALMRLEZZ3QEEI/ The bloom off Te Awanga and Haumoana has been tested and the risk of toxicity is low. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 20:33:45 +0000 The pre-Christmas algal bloom in Te Awanga on Hawke's Bay's Cape Coast was tested for toxicity. The bloom was found to be "of low risk", the Region Council said late on Friday.
